title: Effect of Curcuma longa (Turmeric), as an intra-canal medicament, on inter-appointment endodontic pain in patients with symptomatic irreversible pulpitis: A randomized controlled clinical trial
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Rakesh Singla, Charu Gupta, Gurdeep Singh Gill, Namita Jain, Suraj Arora, Youssef A. Algarni, Mohammed Abdul Kader, Marco Cicci√π, Giuseppe Minervini
